short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A basic Firefox extension which automatically redirects to the classic Reddit layout.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Classic Reddit Layout extension is a simple Firefox extension which redirects the browser whenever it loads the newest version of Reddit. This extension will redirect you to old.reddit.com, so you can use the classic Reddit layout. With no extra features or settings to configure, Classic Reddit Layout is perfect for anyone looking for a quick way to switch back to the classic Reddit design.
